Class DirectionUtils

      • getYaw

        public static float getYaw(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace blockface)
        Gets the equivalent yaw angle of the provided BlockFace.

        Also NaN will be returned if the provided block face is not a 90Â° face. It means that only the following block faces are supported:

        • BlockFace.SOUTH
        • BlockFace.WEST
        • BlockFace.NORTH
        • BlockFace.EAST

        Parameters:
        blockface - Desired block face
        Returns:
        Equivalent yaw angle of the provided BlockFace

      • lookAt

        public static float[] lookAt(org.bukkit.util.Vector from,
                             org.bukkit.util.Vector to)
        Gets the euler angles from the direction vector result of the subtraction of to and from.

        • lookAt (from, to)[0] = yaw angle.
        • lookAt (from, to)[1] = pitch angle.

        Parameters:
        from - Position from
        to - Position to
        Returns:
        Euler angles of the result direction vector

      • lookAt

        public static float[] lookAt(org.bukkit.Location from,
                             org.bukkit.Location to)
        Gets the euler angles from the direction vector result of the subtraction of to and from.

        • lookAt (from, to)[0] = yaw angle.
        • lookAt (from, to)[1] = pitch angle.

        Parameters:
        from - Position from
        to - Position to
        Returns:
        Euler angles of the result direction vector
        See Also:
        lookAt(Vector, Vector)

      • getDirection

        public static org.bukkit.util.Vector getDirection(float yaw,
                                                  float pitch)
        Gets a unit-vector pointing in the direction represented by the specified euler angles (yaw and pitch).

        Parameters:
        yaw - Yaw angle (rotation around axis X).
        pitch - Pitch angle (rotation around axis Y).
        Returns:
        Vector pointing the direction represented by the specified euler angles.

      • getEulerAngles

        public static float[] getEulerAngles(org.bukkit.util.Vector direction)
        Gets the euler angles from the provided direction Vector.

        • getEulerAngles (direction)[0] = yaw angle.
        • getEulerAngles (direction)[1] = pitch angle.

        Parameters:
        direction - Direction vector
        Returns:
        Yaw and pitch angles within an array
